Title: Company Travel Expense Policy

1. Purpose
This policy defines the guidelines for employee business travel expenses at Contoso Corporation.

2. Eligibility
All full-time and part-time employees traveling for company business are eligible for expense reimbursement.

3. Approval Process
- Travel under $500: Manager approval required
- Travel $500-$2000: Director approval required
- Travel over $2000: VP approval required

4. Reimbursable Expenses
- Airfare (economy class for flights under 6 hours)
- Hotel accommodation (up to $200/night)
- Meals (up to $75/day)
- Ground transportation
- Conference registration fees

5. Non-Reimbursable Expenses
- Personal entertainment
- Alcohol
- First-class upgrades without approval
- Travel insurance (covered by company policy)

Last Updated: November 2024
Author: Finance Department
